com.kamontat.rawapi

Interface Updatable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Callable<Updatable>, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GUpdater, Updater

    public interface Updatable
extends Callable<Updatable>, Serializable
    This update able
    If you want to implement you might use Updater instead of this
    Since:
    Mon 20/Mar/2017 - 10:37 PM
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    kamontat

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Updatable call()
      For update information from server, NOT for download file.
      default void delete()
      beware: this method will delete all file in current folder/project
      Using from delete old version is enough
      String getDescription() 
      Downloadable getDownload() 
      String getTitle() 
      Version getVersion() 
      default boolean isLatest()

      • delete

        default void delete()
        beware: this method will delete all file in current folder/project
        Using from delete old version is enough

      • call

        Updatable call()
        throws UpdateException
        For update information from server, NOT for download file.
        The download file should stay at Downloadable.download(Runnable) method when runnable is optional code that will run while loading progress
        Specified by:
        call in interface Callable<Updatable>
        Returns:
        Updatable
        Throws:
        UpdateException - if error occurred while updating
